Package com.spring.web.controller

Class SubmissionController

java.lang.Object
com.spring.web.controller.SubmissionController
@Controller public class SubmissionController extends Object
submission controller is used for all the specific methods related to submission
Author:
Matthew Veldhuizen, Stanley Chilton

      @GetMapping("/quizattempt") public String takeQuiz(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      the quiz that is currently being sat
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the quiz that is being attempted
      model - - model to be passed to the front end
      session - - session storing the users information
      Returns:
      - a string directing the user to the take quiz page or index if not logged in

    • createQuizAttemptObject

      @PostMapping("/quizAttemptObject") public String createQuizAttemptObject(@RequestParam int id, @ModelAttribute TempSubmission tempSubmission, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      sends the quiz attempt object back to the DB
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the quiz to be submitted
      tempSubmission - - the temp submission object to be used to store the data from the
      model - - the model to be passed back to the front end
      session - - the session storing the id of the user
      Returns:
      returns the mapping for the view results page
